note: 0 A.D. is a free and open-source, historical Real Time Strategy game, focused on the period from 500 B.C. to 1 B.C., under development by Wildfire Games. It's cross-platform, playable on Windows, macOS, FreeBSD, Linux, and OpenBSD. Choose from 13 different civilizations, a multitude of maps, game modes, single player or multiplayer.

FreeRCT aims to be a free and open source game which captures the look, feel, and gameplay of the popular games RollerCoaster Tycoon 1 and 2. The game is still in an early alpha state, but it is already playable and offers a variety of features.
Official account for Minetest, an open source game engine. Follow for Minetest news and content. Run by @rubenwardy.

Simutrans is an open-source transportation simulator available for Linux, macOS, Windows and Android. Your goal is to establish a successful transport company by building a transport network you always dreamed of.

Brought to you by the Simutrans Team, an international team of volunteers.
Speed Dreams is an Open Source Motorsport Simulator featuring high-quality 3D graphics and an accurate physics engine, all targeting maximum realism.

Official Veloren account
Veloren is a multiplayer voxel RPG written in #Rust. It is inspired by games such as Cube World, Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Dwarf Fortress and Minecraft.
Veloren is fully open-source, licensed under GPL 3. It uses original graphics, music and assets created by its community. Being contributor-driven, its development community and user community is one and the same: developers, players, artists and musicians come together to develop the game.
